title: Residential Building
subtitle: Contemporary Residential Building
detailBody: This independent residential building was constructed using a systematic construction methodology, covering foundation, superstructure, and finishing works. The project followed defined quality checks at each stage to ensure structural reliability and execution consistency.

title: Commercial Building
subtitle: Commercial Building
detailBody: This commercial building was designed and constructed as a functional commercial facility, with coordinated structural planning and elevation execution. The project scope included design detailing, construction execution, and finishing works, delivered through controlled project management practices.

title: Architectural Projects
subtitle: Architectural Projects
detailBody: Our Architectural design service focuses on creating practical, execution-ready designs that align with construction feasibility. We develop comprehensive architectural plans, elevations, and detailed drawings that support smooth project execution and cost-effective construction.

title: Industrial Project
subtitle: Industrial Project
detailBody: This project showcases our expertise in PEB and industrial construction, executed for efficient operations and long-term durability. The structure is designed with a strong steel framework, proper ventilation, and smooth vehicle movement for logistics and storage purposes. JAZ Builders & Promoters handled the complete project execution, including civil works, PEB erection, boundary works, and site coordination, ensuring structural stability and timely delivery.
